title: The Best Recipes in the World: More Than 1,000 International Dishes to Cook at Home
description: The bestselling author of How to Cook Everything has gathered over 1,000 recipes in 52 international menus for the best dishes that people cook every day on every continent in the world--from Spain to India, from Mexico to Thailand. Two-color interior; 100+ b/w drawings.
author: Mark Bittman
